description: The Toasted Traveler is ambling through Abilene and taking classic comfort grub to a new level with their scrumptious selection of gourmet grilled cheese goodness, made-from-scratch sides, and artisan beverages!This marvelously melted menu is crafted with fresh, local ingredients and includes staples like... The Original Traveler- with cheddar, provolone, & colby-jack cheese on deliciously crispy seasoned sourdough breadBig Poppa- with their signature spiced cream with, diced jalapeños, crumbled bacon, and shredded cheddar cheese...as well as a few special appearances based on what’s in season, including…Ávila- with sweet fig jam, tangy goat cheese, prosciutto, and fresh baby spinach, drizzled with a balsamic reductionBig Tex- with black forest ham, colby-jack cheese, and Mildly Wild BBQ SauceFor all this and much more, take a trip to The Toasted Traveler and savor an ooey gooey taste of unforgettable quality!
name: The Toasted Traveler
